data.text: Ao Awurade, mema me kra so kyerɛ wo;
wo so, Ao me Onyankopɔn, na mede me ho to.
Wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to wo so no mu biara
Kyerɛ me wʼakwan, Ao Awurade,
Fa wo nokorɛ no so kyerɛkyerɛ me,
Kae, Ao Awurade, wo mmɔborɔhunu ne wo dɔ kɛseɛ
Nkae me mmabunu berɛ mu bɔne
Awurade yɛ, na ɔtene;
Ɔde ahobrɛasefoɔ fa ɛkwan pa so
Awurade akwan nyinaa yɛ ɔdɔ ne nokorɛdie
Ao Awurade, me bɔne so deɛ,
Enti hwan ne onipa a ɔsuro Awurade?
Ɔbɛdi yie wɔ ne nkwa nna mu,
Awurade da nʼatirimsɛm adi kyerɛ wɔn a wɔsuro no;
Mʼani da Awurade so daa,
Dane wʼani hwɛ me, na dom me,
Mʼakoma mu dadwene adɔɔso;
Hwɛ me haw ne mʼahohiahia
Hwɛ sɛdeɛ mʼatamfoɔ adɔɔso
Bɔ me nkwa ho ban na gye me.
Ma tenenee ne nokorɛ mmɔ me ho ban,
Gye Israel, Ao Onyankopɔn,
